name: Metal Bubbles: Bubbles of Liberty
description:
this video game was made for the Mini Jam 33 in almost 24hours.

In this game, you'll have to get a diamant hide in a weird base. Try not to fail seal !

ZQSD / WASD    -     movements

SHIFT      -      stop "bubbling"

when you stop "bubbling" you can't get seen by the enemies (only normals ones, not  cameras)  and when you are in seaweed you can't get seen by everyone (even cameras)

I'm really sorry for the bad quality of the game, i didn't have enough time to make the game looks better.

i hope you'll still like the game but sorry again for the only two levels and every bugs
